member.name: M:StellarBlueAssignment.Controllers.EnergyController.ImportData(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves MCP data for the specified date range, calculates daily averages, and stores the results in the database (upsert). Example: POST /api/energy/ImportData/2025-09-01/2025-09-28

member.name: M:StellarBlueAssignment.Controllers.EnergyController.GetData(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the stored daily average energy prices within the range [from,to]. Example: GET /api/energy/GetData/2025-09-01/2025-09-28
